external_homepage: Companion package to paper 'Why ice ages could be unpredictable' (to be submitted in Earth and Planetary Science Letters).
name: iceages
short_description: Companion package to paper 'Why ice ages could be unpredictable' (to be submitted in Earth and Planetary Science Letters). Includes F90 codes of eight conceptual climate models of ice ages and the various dynamical system analysis techniques used in the article. The package will be useful to anyone interested in doing research on these models in particular, and on ice age dynamics in general.
